carda4.Institution: Technologist in Analysis and Information Systems

card1.taksMessage: Development of a customer service application called Nuevo Atentos, where requests, complaints, claims, and reports (PQRD) are received. The project is currently 85% complete. We work under the Scrum Master methodology where in some sprints I performed as a software developer and in others as a QA Engineer, gathering functional and non-functional requirements, documenting user stories, use cases, and mockups. Technology (Angular-TypeScript-JavaScript-HTML-CCS3) DB (Oracle)
card1.location: Cali, Valle del Cauca, Colombia Â· Hybrid

card2.taksMessage: Development of a sales and billing application called Pos Web for Drogas La Rebaja, where I play a key role in creating and improving modules using technologies such as PHP Framework Yii2, jQuery, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. I also work in database management in MySQL and Linux server management. Additionally, I have been part of the development of microservices using technologies like NestJS, Angular, and MongoDB, working within the Scrum methodology.
card2.location: Cali, Valle del Cauca Â· Remote

card3.taksMessage: Analyst and system leader, where my main function was to lead, perform tests, and gather requirements for hospital and administrative software (modification, updating, or error correction). I also conducted internal audits based on ISO 9001, network administration using Windows Server 2012, Linux. Another of my functions was to control the acquisition and delivery of equipment, configuration, preventive and corrective maintenance of computer equipment, network to ensure all information systems function properly.

card4.taksMessage: Development of a farmer registration software (CRUP), crops and products of all the rural areas in Bugalagrande, with their personal data, farm sizes, and cultivated products. The software also includes statistics on the most cultivated products in certain rural areas or the entire municipality. Technology (Java JDBC-JavaScript -HTML5-CCS3) DB (Mysql)
